*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Austin to Austin, October 20, 1830. Pessimistic views of Mexican government. Doubts establishment of tranquillity, and until that is done Austin must hold the helm.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brassoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-20-1830">Octo- 20. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My dear Sir I have recd yours by *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*with the enclosures and now return the Pedimento signed.*/p*
*p*I regret much that affairs have taken so unfavorable a turn at *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*but I have witnessed so many political squables in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned* the last six years that I set them down as of but little acct, They usually make a great deal of noise and do nothing— The result of *person_mentioned*Viesca*/person_mentioned*'s offer of resignation will probably be a reconciliation However I doubt much whether you can permanently hold your ground as a *person_mentioned*member of the Legislature*/person_mentioned*— The independent stand which both your principles and interests would compell you to take would embroil you with both *person_mentioned*parties*/person_mentioned*— Still there is no other course left you to pursue and the novelty of an upright independent public man pursuing solely the interests of the *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*in conformity with the constitution might make a salutary impression even upon *person_mentioned*Mexicans*/person_mentioned*— If you can steer clear of these political broils I think they will in the main conduce to the interests of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*— They paralize the *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*arm and put it out of the power of the Govt to interfere with you by force— So long therefore as they abstain from any legislative acts affecting your rights or interests in Gods name let them wrangle amongst themselves as much as they please*/p*
*p*I seriously believe that my prediction, now five years old, that the want of material for a stable Govt would ultimately cause the *location_mentioned*Mexican republic*/location_mentioned* to break up into little *location_mentioned*principalities*/location_mentioned*, each Governed by a *person_mentioned*popular Chief*/person_mentioned* to the extent of his personal influence and no further, like the*location_mentioned* malay region*/location_mentioned*, will one day be realized *person_mentioned*Don Felipe*/person_mentioned* appears to be aiming at that now and I strongly suspect *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*looks to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*for his share, Flatter him in that point and make him believe the *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* look up to him as their political Savior and you may do anything with him As to my own affairs—I have visited the *location_mentioned*junction of the two creeks*/location_mentioned* and find the land to be good grasing land, the timber small and much of the *location_mentioned*tract crawfish land*/location_mentioned*, still the position is pleasant*location_mentioned* Flores creek*/location_mentioned* fresh and I think the situation would be healthy-— You appear to be in error as to the *location_mentioned*league Survey'd for *person_mentioned*Clark*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* it does not reach *location_mentioned*Flores creek—*/location_mentioned*the distance from *location_mentioned*oyster creek*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Flores */location_mentioned*is 8 or 10 Miles the *location_mentioned*island of timber*/location_mentioned* in the centre of *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Clark*/person_mentioned*s league*/location_mentioned* is full seven miles this side of *location_mentioned*Flores Creek*/location_mentioned* The land on this side *location_mentioned*Flores Creek*/location_mentioned* is good *location_mentioned*praire */location_mentioned*with a narrow skirt of timber one or two miles down *location_mentioned*Bastrop creek*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*below the forks*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Should my solicitation be granted I should like to have one league *location_mentioned*between Clarks survey and Flores Creek*/location_mentioned* half a league wide and running down*location_mentioned* Bastrop creek*/location_mentioned* for quantity.*/p*
*p*I am told *location_mentioned*Chocolate creek*/location_mentioned* comes within one league of *location_mentioned*Austin creek*/location_mentioned* or of *location_mentioned*Bastrop*/location_mentioned*s somewhere *location_mentioned*near the junction of Austin and Flores*/location_mentioned*—and that there is plenty of timber on *location_mentioned*Chocolate */location_mentioned*at that point, I should like *location_mentioned*one league running through from creek to creek*/location_mentioned* just for a highway to get in timber for my *location_mentioned*buildings */location_mentioned*For the fourth league I should like to embrace *location_mentioned*St Louis Island,*/location_mentioned* the *location_mentioned*Island */location_mentioned*with trees on it and so much of the point of main land along the coast as would make up a league on joint acct*/p*
*p*This will one day be valuable for making salt for a position to accommodate shipping, as a *location_mentioned*fishing station*/location_mentioned* and for pasturage for cattle which must ultimately be driven there for shipment.*/p*
*p*You will say I am reckoning my chickens before they are hatched—but I mention these things that in case the concession should come on you may know what lands I should like to have reserved if circumstances will permit it— I see no reason why *person_mentioned*Viesca */person_mentioned*should not comply with his declaration to Doct Grant, but *person_mentioned*Smith */person_mentioned*under date of*date_mentioned n="08-29-1830"> August 29th*/date_mentioned*—says nothing of having received any papers from *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*— the amount of his letter is that my *location_mentioned*buildings */location_mentioned*remain rented at 60$ pr month without a prospect of sale and *person_mentioned*Mr Grant*/person_mentioned* writes he hopes to send forward the proceeds of my bar silver shortly*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*is truly a land of promise ! ! but it requires a deal of patience to wait the performance.*/p*
*p*As for the future my first object is to free myself from the embarassments of the steamboat concern and should my concession be granted to come here with all the means I can command to make a permanent location and give my best efforts to the promotion of the interests of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*— It would however be folly for me to devote the remainder of my life to the occupation of a league of land*/p*
*p*I must do something on an extensive scale with prospects of ultimate advantages of magnitude or do nothing, you and I may indulge our imaginations with the pleasing prospect of passing the remainder of life in the tranquility which a snug *location_mentioned*stock farm */location_mentioned*appears to offer but neither you nor I could exist in such a State. It would be very well to have a good *location_mentioned*stock farm*/location_mentioned* but not to be confined to it as a sole dependance—*/p*
*p*Besides until a stable Govt be established and security for personal rights and property placed on a firm basis there can be no tranquility on a farm of any sort, until this be effected you will be compelled ex necessitate to direct the helm*/p*
*p*on the subject of the *location_mentioned*canal */location_mentioned*project you will please inform me when you think circumstances favorable to it in the mean time I will collect what information I can on that subject and as to the Live oak timber, something may grow out of it hereafter— I am in trouble enough this morning— It was my intention to have gone to sea to day—but the beef *person_mentioned*Bailey */person_mentioned*packd for me has spoiled and four of my *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*deserted last night, which will detain me until I can procure provisions and men it is now uncertain when I shall get away. You will oblige me by leaving word with *person_mentioned*Mr Williams*/person_mentioned* to send all letters which may come to *location_mentioned*Sn Felipe*/location_mentioned* for me to *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* who will pay the postage*/p*
*p*I will write you from *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*so soon as I have so arranged my affairs as to be able to decide upon my future course in the mean time may god bless you and enable you to bring your troublesome enterprise to a favorable close*/p*
*p*Wherever I may be you can always rely upon me in any matter in which I can be usefull to you*/p*
*p*Most Cordially and sincerely yours*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Henry Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*ps. I enclose a letter for *location_mentioned*matamoros */location_mentioned*which please put in the mail if no safe private oppertunity offers—*/p*
*/div1*
